scripts.copy: mkdir -p public && cp src/static/wigrum-light.otf public && cp src/static/mackinac/P22MackinacPro-Book_25.otf public/ && mkdir -p public/uploads && mkdir -p public/admin && cp src/admin/* public/admin && cp src/static/*.svg public && cp src/static/*.png public && cp src/uploads/* public/uploads
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run sass-watch"
scripts.build: npm run copy && node build-home.js && node build-services.js && node build-consultation.js && node build-about.js && node build-resources.js && npm run sass && npm run build-js
